compilations.description: Chicken is always a crowd favorite, but we you gotta switch it up! Say goodbye to your plain Jane chicken recipes and taste test our carefully picked recipes. If you are a guac fiend like we are, you will absolutely devour the Bacon Guacamole Chicken Bombs and if you're going the fancy route, the Buffalo Chicken Dip is a must-have! Don't forget to pick your favorites!

Balance your sweet side with something savoury by trying out these cheesy recipes.. and see for yourself why Jerry kept coming back for more.  SAY YES TO CHEESE!

compilations.description: These recipes are for those lazy days we all experience. Those days when even moving your finger feels like a chore! Well, we know how you feel, and so we have perfectly curated these easy "lazy" recipes you can make so that you can extend your nap just a little longer! From Hasselback Pizza Chicken to Meatball Sub Bake , we have you covered. So sit back and be lazy. After all, you deserve it!

description: Why choose between pizza and chicken when you can have both? This juicy chicken breast is stuffed with mozzarella cheese and topped with pizza sauce, pepperoni, and more cheese. Perfect for a quick and easy weeknight dinner.

instructions.display_text: Cut seven slits on the top of the chicken breast.
In each slit, spread 1 teaspoon of tomato puree, 1 mozzarella slice, and 1 salami slice.
Preheat oven to 350˚F (180˚C).
Sprinkle on the cheddar cheese and oregano.
Bake for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. It should have an internal temperature of 165˚F (75˚C).
Enjoy!

name: Hasselback Pizza Chicken

tips_summary.content:
• Season the chicken with garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and Italian seasoning for extra flavor 🧄🧅🌶️🌿
• Marinate the chicken for added flavor and tenderness 🍖🧄
• Try using pepperoni instead of salami for a different twist 🍕🍕🍕
• Experiment with different types of cheese like provolone, cheddar, or a pizza blend 🧀🧀🧀
• Consider using pizza sauce, marinara sauce, or spaghetti sauce instead of tomato puree for a saucier experience 🍕🍝🍅

description: 10 minutes to homemade pizza bagels! Ours are bigger (and better!) than the store-bought kind. Keep it classic with pizza sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni, or swap in your favorite sauce and topping combo.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).

On a cutting board, arrange the bagel halves cut side-up. Spread 2 tablespoons of pizza sauce in an even layer over each half, then top each with 1 tablespoon of mozzarella and 1 tablespoon of mini pepperoni.
Place the bagel halves on a rimmed baking sheet and bake until the cheese has melted, about 8 minutes. Serve immediately.
Enjoy!

name: Pizza Bagels

description: Pizza night couldn’t get any easier than these loaded garlic bread slices. With a variety of toppings, there’s something for everyone, or you can go all-in on your favorite combo.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C).
Arrange the frozen garlic toast on a baking sheet.
Make the pepperoni garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the pizza sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni.
Make the veggie lovers garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the pizza sauce, mozzarella, bell pepper, zucchini, mushrooms, and olives.
Make the bacon jalapeño garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the ranch, mozzarella, crumbled bacon, and pickled jalapeño slices.
Make the margherita garlic bread pizza: Top 2 slices of garlic toast with the tomato slices and mozzarella.
Bake for 8–12 minutes, until the bread is crispy and warmed through and the cheese is melted. Garnish the margherita garlic bread pizzas with the basil.
Enjoy!

description: Are you tired of the same old pizza routine? Shake things up with these irresistible pizza bombs! Say goodbye to the hassle of homemade dough because these savory delights are made with store-bought biscuit dough, ensuring a quick and stress-free prep. You'll fill each soft and pillowy biscuit round with a spoonful of zesty marinara sauce, a savory pepperoni slice, and a cube of mozzarella cheese before baking them in a hot oven to golden perfection. These pizza bombs are bursting with flavor in every bite. Whether you're hosting a party or craving a fun twist on pizza night, these little bombs are guaranteed to be a hit.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and grease with butter.
Cut each biscuit in half. Press each half into a circle with your thumb.
Place a small dollop of marinara sauce, 1 pepperoni, and 1 cube of mozzarella cheese in the center of each biscuit round.
Bring the edges up and over, pressing them together and being sure to leave no gaps for the filling to leak out. Lay the pizza bombs on the prepared baking sheet.
Combine the melted butter, garlic, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning in a small bowl.
Brush the butter mixture onto each pizza bomb and top with Parmesan.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the bombs have nicely browned.
Once they are cool enough to handle, serve with marinara sauce alongside.
Enjoy!

name: Pizza Bombs

tips_summary.content:
• Try using different types of dough for easier handling and a more desirable flavor 🥐🍕
• Use a minimal amount of sauce or omit it from the inside of the bombs and use it as a dipping sauce instead 🍅🍕
• Use whole biscuits instead of cutting them in half for larger, easier-to-handle bombs 🥐
• Try using shredded cheese instead of cubes for a better cheese-to-dough ratio 🧀🥐
• Experiment with additional ingredients like extra pepperoni, different types of meat, or additional seasonings for more flavor 👨‍🍳🌶️🍖

compilations.name: Dinner Recipes For Every Night In June

instructions.display_text: Whizz together the flour and water in a food processor for a minute or so until it clumps together to form a single ball. You might need to add a little bit more water or flour to get the consistency right. (Dough should be soft, but not sticky!)
Preheat the grill (broiler) on high.
On a floured surface, roll out the dough to about 1 cm (½ inch) thick.
Place pizza dough onto a well-oiled, oven-safe frying pan on high heat.
While the bottom is cooking on the hob, top the pizza with the sauce, cheese, pepperoni herbs and whatever else you like. (Try your best to not over-top it or else it can fall apart or get soggy.)
Continue cooking on high until the edges of the crust start browning and crisping.
Place the pan under the grill and cook the toppings until the cheese is bubbly and browning. Slice.
If you’re quick, you can actually have this from-scratch pizza on your plate (and in you mouth) quicker than it takes to cook a pre-made frozen pizza.
Enjoy!

name: Pizza From Scratch In 20 Minutes Or Less

components.raw_text: 3 tablespoons pizza sauce (this can be a simple tomato sauce, or something you’ve made yourself!)

description: For a lazy night in, try this quick and delicious pizza toastie stuffed with cheese and pepperoni.

instructions.display_text: Top one piece of bread with marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni.
Cover with a second piece of bread and butter both slices of bread from edge to edge.
Place in preheated toastie machine and cook until bread is golden brown. (If the toastie is not browning evenly, flip half way through).
Remove from toastie and slice in half.
Enjoy!

description: Whip up a mouthwatering one-pan pizza in just 20 minutes, perfect for those busy weeknights! This scrumptious, no-fuss recipe will have your taste buds dancing with delight.

instructions.display_text: In a large nonstick pan, combine the warm water, olive oil, flour, sugar, yeast, and salt. Use a spatula to stir the ingredients, then smooth the dough to the edges of the pan.
Spread the marinara sauce over the dough, all the way to the edges. Sprinkle the mozzarella evenly over the sauce, then top with the pepperoni.
Place over medium heat, cover, and cook for 10 minutes with the vent covered.
Uncover the vent and cook for 5 more minutes, until the edges are crispy.
Slide the pizza out of the pan onto a cutting board and let cool for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with basil, then slice and serve.
Enjoy!

description: A mouthwatering pizza made with creamy alfredo sauce, topped with tender chicken, gooey cheese, and fresh herbs.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out dough to about 10-12 inches (25-30 cm) in diameter.
Top pizza with alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and tomatoes.
Bake in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until crust is crispy and cheese is melted and turning golden brown.
Garnish with parsley and cut into 8 slices.
Enjoy!

name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza

description: This BBQ chicken pita pizza is a fun and easy twist on a classic favorite. Top a crispy pita bread with BBQ sauce, shredded chicken, and gooey mozzarella cheese for a deliciously unique pizza.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a medium bowl, toss the chicken with 2 tablespoons of BBQ sauce until well-coated.
Place the pita bread on the prepared baking sheet and spread the remaining 2 tablespoons of BBQ sauce on top. Scatter the chicken over the pita, then top with shredded mozzarella and red onion.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the chicken is heated through.
Garnish with fresh cilantro, then slice and serve.
Enjoy!

compilations.description: Tired of the same old cheese pizzas? Take your regular crusts to the next level with these exceptionally unique pizza recipes. Toss your dough into a waffle iron for that cheesy goodness or bring your taste buds to life with our beautiful Rose pizzas. Trust us, this is what all pizza-lover dreams are made of!
compilations.name: New And Unique Ways To Make Pizza

compilations.description: Do you want to upgrade your favorite waffle into something even better? We've got you covered. Start with the scrumptious Chicken Waffle Nachos or bring waffles right into your next pizza night with Pizza Waffles. It's impossible not to love waffles — and these recipes are proof.
compilations.name: Waffle Lovers Only

compilations.description: Feeding the kids on a busy weeknight doesn't have to be a daunting task. Kick off the week with some Cheese-stuffed Sliders, or satisfy their sweet tooth with S'mores Cones. Put a twist on a plain ol' bowl of tomato soup with a Grilled Cheese Bowl or bring some imagination to dinner time with a Sleepy Rice Bear. You can make weeknights delicious with these recipes we've curated, just for you.
compilations.name: Weeknight Meals Kids Will Love

compilations.description: You're hard at work all day, and as tough as you are, snacking is the only thing powering you through. But if you're stuck in a total snack rut, we're here to break you out of it. From mouth-watering honey barbecue chicken wings to spicy hot Cheeto fries. these recipes will definitely satisfy your taste buds and will have people coming back for more.
compilations.name: Tasty's Top 25 Snacks

compilations.description: Toss aside the Nutella and strawberries: We've got some incredible savory ways you can enjoy waffles. Our chili filled cornbread waffles are great, and our rosemary-loaded grilled cheese waffles are classic, easy, and filling. We love the waffle and chicken nachos that put a great twist on a classic flavor combination. Waffle you waiting for? Let's get cooking!
compilations.name: Savory Waffles So Good You'll Forget Dessert

compilations.description: Anytime is snacktime, and we're here to keep you munching for every day of the month. Start small with a heaping bowl of Rainbow Kettle Corn. Once you master the art of snacking, move on to some Grilled Fajita Skewers! The best part - you won't be the only 'snack' in your house, if you get our drift.
compilations.name: 30 Snacks For 30 Days

compilations.description: If you're a pizza fiend like us (and let's face it, who isn't), we've got a way to turn pizza night deliciously rogue and utterly unique. Try out our cheese-stuffed pizza pretzel for a dairy-filled delight, or get in your daily veggie quota with our Cheesy Eggplant Pizza that's ooey, gooey, and oh-so-delightful! That cheese slice may have your heart now but once you try these, oh boy, pizza night's about to get a whole lot more interesting.
compilations.name: Unique Pizza Recipes!

compilations.description: Are you a closeted snacker? We're not judging: we're just here to make your snack dreams come true. From mouth-watering finger sandwiches to some finger-licking good BBQ popcorn, there's something for every tastebud. So go ahead, take your pick and start snacking!
compilations.name: 10 Snacks Under 10 Minutes

compilations.description: Who needs something basic? Definitely not you! Time to up your game and enter the world of the unknown. Ever tried Pizza Waffles? Or maybe an EPIC Pretzel Cheesecake? Yes, you read that right. These are not your typical recipes, they are different, challenging, and above all, tasty as hell!
compilations.name: Recipes With A Twist

compilations.description: Who can resist pizza? We know we can't. A good pizza is the ultimate showstopper. Everyone loves it. There’s no denying that. But we’re taking it up a notch! No more of that plain Jane stuff. Here are some fun pizza recipes that are total game-changers, one for every night of the month! You’ve gotta try our super cheesy Pizza Bombs, our Meatball-Stuffed Crust Pizza Star, or of course, if you’re craving pizza for breakfast (because honestly, same), our Breakfast Pizza Boats!
compilations.name: 30 Fun Pizza Recipes For The Entire Month!

description: Get ready to flip your breakfast routine on its head with these pizza waffles! Crispy and cheesy, these waffles are an exciting way start to any day, and will have your taste buds saying "that's amore!"

instructions.display_text: Slice the pizza dough into 8 equal pieces, then press each piece flat.
Place 4 pieces of dough into a preheated, greased waffle iron.
Spread one tablespoon of marinara, ¼ cup (25 grams) of mozzarella, and 3 slices of pepperoni on each piece of dough.
Top with the 4 remaining pieces of dough and seal.
Cook for 3-5 minutes, until golden brown, then serve.
Enjoy!

name: Pizza Waffles

components.raw_text: 1 (14-ounce) tube pizza dough or homemade pizza dough

description: Fire up your taste buds with these BBQ Chicken Tortilla Pizzas, a perfect blend of smoky barbecue sauce and tender chicken on a crispy tortilla crust. It's a quick and easy weeknight meal that'll have you saying "yum-o" in no time!

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 350ºF (180ºC) and line a tray with parchment paper.
Debone, remove skin, and shred rotisserie chicken.
Spread BBQ sauce evenly across tortillas.
Top with onion, chicken, and cheese.
Bake for 5-10 minutes.
Enjoy!

keywords: , 4 ways, dinner, parm melt, pizza, pot pie, potato skin, rotisserie chicken, tortilla
name: BBQ Chicken Tortilla Pizzas

compilations.description: ¡Hola! Are your taste buds bored of having the same food all day? Let's fire up your taste buds with these hot & sweet Mexican-inspired recipes and treat yourself to some really unique dishes! Check out our tortilla dessert cups and munch on this delicious taco pizza. Feliz Navidad!
compilations.name: Mexican Recipes With A Twist!

compilations.description: If you've been longing for street-style tacos, look no further! We've curated a special assortment of taco recipes with a twist just for you! So invite your friends over, then try out the epic and crunchy taco ring. Or, if you prefer going solo, try out the crunchy taco cups. Can you hear your stomach growling already?
compilations.name: Tacos With A Twist!

compilations.description: If you're ever in the mood to mix things up, you might want to try experimenting with pizza. Impress your guests at your next party with some Pizza Nachos, or get the best of two worlds with a Pizza Pretzel. Or maybe, just maybe, go indulge in a piece of Upisde Down Pizza. Pizza might be a classic, but that doesn't mean you can't give it your own unique spin!

compilations.description: Over the years, we've found countless ways to enjoy the world's most popular food: pizza. Sure, a classic pie is great, but our pizza bread bowl is just as incredible. If you're looking for a unique mash-up, we've combined pizza with lasagna, tacos, and even chicken cordon bleu. Make these pizza recipes and you'll never run out of ways to say 'that's amore!'

compilations.description: Who can resist pizza? We know we can't. A good pizza is the ultimate showstopper. Everyone loves it. There’s no denying that. But we’re taking it up a notch! No more of that plain Jane stuff. Here are some fun pizza recipes that are total game-changers, one for every night of the month! You’ve gotta try our super cheesy Pizza Bombs, our Meatball-Stuffed Crust Pizza Star, or of course, if you’re craving pizza for breakfast (because honestly, same), our Breakfast Pizza Boats!

description: Experience the best of both worlds with this scrumptious Taco Pizza! It's a fiesta of flavors, combining your favorite taco toppings on a crispy pizza crust for a meal that's sure to please.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a skillet over high heat, cook ground beef with salt, pepper, and taco seasoning until fully cooked. Remove from heat and set aside.
Place pizza dough on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Bake for 10 minutes.
Top pizza dough with beef mixture and cheese. Bake for an additional 5 minutes.
Top pizza with lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, and sour cream.
Enjoy!

name: Taco Pizza

compilations.name: Cheat Meals To Have Before Your New Years Resolution Begins
7 Pizza Recipes to Master At Home

compilations.description: Everyone loves chicken, and these are the best of our recipes! Pick one from the lot, be it either the chicken chow mein or the feta and spinach stuffed chicken pie. These recipes will delight everyone's taste buds and keep you craving even more. So what are you waiting for? Grab your spice box and let's get cookin' shall we?
compilations.name: Tasty's Favorite Chicken Recipes!

compilations.description: Turn up the heat with these extremely spicy dishes. Test your tongue with a cheesy and spicy Hot Cheetos Burrito. Fancy some Asian flavors? Pull out your wok for a chili-loaded Schechuan Chicken. You might want to keep a glass of milk handy!
compilations.name: Spicy Snacks to Give Your Meal A Kick

compilations.description: Who doesn't love Pizza Hut? The soft, pillowy crust, the stretchy cheese, and all of the toppings – now wait, you don't have to order just yet. Instead, whip up our wallet-friendly Pizza Hut recipes at home! For a classic appetizer, test out our Cheddar Ranch Chicken Strips. Paired with a Greek-inspired BBQ Chicken Pita Pizza, your memories of the Hut will be long gone. The only catch? You have to share.
compilations.name: Make Pizza Hut Recipes At Home!

compilations.description: Do you have a sweet tooth or are you more spice inclined? These recipes will have you covered no matter what your taste buds demand. Our egg sriracha avocado toast is bound to wake you right up while our chocolate avocado smoothie is good for your gut and your cravings. Our birthday dip cake is a great way to increase your mid-day energy level. And we guarantee you'll basically inhale our protein-packed, cayenne pepper roasted chickpeas. So what's your snacking style?
compilations.name: Extreme Challenge: Sweet Vs Spicy Meals

compilations.description: Bland is boring! A little spice can elevate any meal. If you agree with that statement, then get your palate ready to reach new heights! Why don't you check out these recipes to spice up your day? From a spicy-chicken-pizza to spicy-korean-bbq-style-pork , these recipes are sure to get you smacking your lips for more!
compilations.name: Time To Spice It Up!

compilations.description: Hot, hot, hot! It's well-known that spices elevate the flavor of food. Just a bit of spice can transform everyday ingredients into an appetizing meal, but add too much and your mouth could be on fire! If you're someone who is a bit daring and loves spicy food, these recipes are perfect for you! Try our Spicy Chicken Pizza or our mouth-watering Spicy Slow Cooker BBQ!
compilations.name: Spice Up Your Life

compilations.description: Clean out your cheese drawer with these specially curated cheese recipes. From comfort foods to fine dining dishes, we’ve got it all! Start out your meal with these perfect appetizer: 3-Cheese Garlic Bread Take it further with delicious Stuffed Chicken Parmesan and on a sweet note with the Cream Cheese-Filled Banana Bread Muffins. Gear up for the ultimate cheese marathon.
compilations.name: Just Take It Cheesy!

compilations.description: When we think of fast food, our mouths begin to salivate and our stomachs get ready to enjoy a delicious and ever-filling meal. Fast food is something we all love, that sometimes it's just not possible to go out and buy, for whatever the reason may be. Well, have no fear; we are here. We have hand-picked our favorite fast food recipes just for you! From our famous Honey BBQ Chicken Wings to golden and crispy Air Fryer Fish & Chips , we have it all! So what are you waiting for? Dig in!
compilations.name: Fast Food You Can Make at Home!

description: Fire up your taste buds with this fiery and flavorful pizza. The zesty tomato sauce, gooey cheese, and tender chicken are topped with a generous sprinkle of fiery spices that will make your mouth sing. With each cheesy, spicy bite, you'll be transported to flavor town, where every slice is a slice of pure pizza paradise!

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 450ºF (230ºC).
In a small bowl, whisk together pizza sauce with Frank’s Red Hot Original. Set aside.
Drizzle a 12-inch (30 ½ cm) cast iron skillet with olive oil. Use your hand or a paper towel to evenly coat the pan with oil. Sprinkle pan with cornmeal.
Press pizza dough into the pan so that it covers the whole surface evenly.
Spread spicy pizza sauce on the dough. Top with mozzarella, chicken, and bacon. Scatter spinach, cherry tomatoes, and red onion on top.
Bake pizza for 14–16 minutes until edges are browned and crisp.
Remove from oven and let cool for 5 minutes, then drizzle with Frank’s Red Hot Original and ranch dressing. Slice and serve.
Enjoy!

name: Spicy Chicken Pizza

components.raw_text: 1½ tablespoons Frank’s Red Hot Original, plus more for drizzling
3 pieces bacon, torn into ½-inch pieces

compilations.name: 6 Ways To Hack Canned Biscuits Without Baking Them

compilations.description: Let's face it, no one likes doing the dishes. It's annoying and tedious, but hey, that's no reason to tuck in to another night of Top Ramen. That's where we come in, and so do those long-forgotten coffee mugs. For your sugar cravings, indulge in our blueberry French toast in a mug. Rushing to work? The 3-minute microwave mug omelet breakfast is there for you. And for a late-night pasta delight, tuck into our mug-baked rigatoni. No one will believe that it came out of the microwave, not even you!
compilations.name: Easy Mug Recipes For Lazy Cooks

compilations.description: What's better than making the best out of your most used kitchen essential: Mug! No pulling out 3 bowls, 2 pans for cooking and spending hours cleaning up the dishes. Take out your favourite mug because it's time for some Pizza in a mug. Feeling fancy? How about a Mug baked Rigatoni. Craving something sweet at 2 AM? Whip up a Chocolate Muffin in just 2 mins! All you need is a mug!
compilations.name: All You Need is a Mug!
compilations.thumbnail_alt_text: All you need is a Mug!

compilations.description: Life lesson: Having gone through life, we as humans have learnt one thing, people disappoint. But, pizza NEVER disappoints! So put all your hope and expectations on a double stuffed pan pizza or a hot pizza bagel ! And come out full and satisfied!
compilations.name: People Disappoint, But Pizza Never Does.

compilations.description: Mug cooking is one of the greatest boons of our existence. You can snap up a quick, yet delicious, meal all in one dish. This rigatoni looks fancy AF, but comes out of a mug. Have frequent midnight cravings? Bookmark this pizza in a mug or check out these different flavored mug cakes. For busy mornings, we recommend this blueberry french toast in a mug. Get your mugs ready already!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook In A Mug

description: Need pizza in a flash? Stuck in a dorm room with just a microwave? Feeling lazy? We have the perfect 60-second pizza recipe that tastes almost like the real thing. The secret? Canned biscuits!

instructions.display_text: Add the biscuit to a microwave-safe mug. MIcrowave for 30 seconds, until the biscuit starts to puff up.
In a small bowl, mix together the marinara sauce, garlic powder, and a pinch of basil.
Spoon the sauce over the par-cooked biscuit, then top with the mozzarella and mini pepperoni.
Loosely cover the mug with a paper towel and microwave for 30–45 seconds more, until the cheese is melted and the biscuit is cooked through.
Top with another pinch of basil, then let the mini pizza cool for about 5 minutes before serving.
Enjoy!

keywords: 6 biscuit hacks, alternative recipes, biscuit bao buns, biscuits from a can, boil, buzzfeed, canned biscuits, cheeseburger bombs, deep fry, dessert, dinner, easy bao, fried ice cream, grill, hacks, instructions, matt ciampa, microwave, microwave pizza, mini pretzels, pan fry, pbj fritters, peanut butter and jelly fritters, pizza in a mug, pretzel bites, recipe, snack breakfast, steam, tasty, tricks, tutorial
name: Pizza In A Mug

description: Craving pizza? Look no further! These vegan pizza bagels are a game-changer. Topped with flavorful tomato sauce, melty vegan cheese, and all your favorite veggies, they're a super fun way to satisfy your pizza cravings.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
Arrange the bagels cut-side up on a baking sheet. Brush with olive oil.
Spread the marinara sauce over the pizzas, then sprinkle with a bit of garlic. Top with the vegan mozzarella and pepper Jack cheeses.
Add your toppings of choice, such as pepperoni or ground sausage, spinach, red onion, mushrooms, bell peppers, and olives. Sprinkle a bit more cheese on top and finish with a pinch of oregano.
Bake for 15 minutes until the cheese is completely melted.
Enjoy!

name: Tabitha Brown’s Healthy Vegan Pizza Bagels

components.raw_text: 1 25-ounce jar of marinara sauce with basil
1 8-ounce bag of shredded vegan mozzarella cheese
1 8-ounce bag of shredded vegan pepper Jack cheese

components.extra_comment: sliced for pepperoni or ground for sausage
components.raw_text: 12 ounces of vegan Italian sausage, sliced for pepperoni or ground for sausage

ingredient.display_plural: diced red and green bell peppers
ingredient.display_singular: diced red and green bell pepper

Sure, slices of pepperoni pizza are great, but once you try our Pepperoni Pizza Monkey Bread, you might never be going back. description: Say hello to these scrumptious Pepperoni Dippers, perfect for satisfying your pizza cravings in a fun, shareable way! Dunk 'em in marinara sauce and enjoy the cheesy, pepperoni-filled goodness with friends and family.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Spread pizza dough out on a parchment-lined pan.
Bake 10 minutes.

Bake an additional 10 minutes.
Slice and dip!

description: This breakfast pizza is a fun and savory way to start the day! The crispy crust and cheesy toppings make for a satisfying meal.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 450ºF (232 ºC).
Roll out your pizza dough (homemade or store bought). Add olive oil.
Cover with whatever toppings you prefer.
Bake the pizza for 10-12 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked to your preference. We cooked it until the egg whites were cooked, but the egg yolks were still runny. But you do you.
Enjoy!

description: These savory bites are perfect for a quick and easy dinner or appetizer. The mini deep dish pizzas are made with pizza dough, pizza sauce, and your favorite toppings like cheese, pepperoni, and veggies.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C)
In a large bowl mix marinara sauce, parmesan cheese, pepper, salt, and oregano.
Lightly oil a 12-cup muffin tin or coat with nonstick spray.
Lay tortilla on a flat surface. Using an empty can, cut 3-4 medium circles, pressing firmly enough in a rocking motion to cut through the tortilla.
Fit tortilla circle into each of 12 muffin cup.
Scoop 1 tablespoon pizza sauce into each muffin cup.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
Top with mini pepperonis.
Place into oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until cheese has melted.
Serve immediately.
Enjoy!

name: Mini Pizza Bites

compilations.name: Everything You Need To Know About A Cast Iron

Impress your guests at your next party with some Pizza Nachos, or get the best of two worlds with a Pizza Pretzel. Or maybe, just maybe, go indulge in a piece of Upisde Down Pizza. Pizza might be a classic, but that doesn't mean you can't give it your own unique spin!

compilations.description: The last year has all been topsy-turvy and well, our kitchens have been all aflutter too – it's no wonder we channeled that chaos into some of our summertime favorites! From an Upside Down One-Pan PIzza to our Upside Down Kiwi Cake, life's still regaining some balance, but that doesn't mean that we can't indulge our tastebuds in the meantime. Don't forget to turn it 'upside down' in the kitchen and once you do, let us know: what's your pick?
compilations.name: Turn Your World Upside Down With These Recipes

description: This fun upside-down deep-dish pizza recipe simplifies cooking and cleanup in one fell swoop. In a single pan, layer pepperoni, sautéed onions and green bell peppers, three types of cheeses, and pizza sauce, then top with store-bought dough that promises a golden crust. Slide the pan into a hot oven and let the magic happen for 20 minutes. However, a word of caution: don your oven mitts to safely flip the pizza out of the pan when it's time for the big reveal. This upside-down pizza is guaranteed to become a favorite, perfect for impressing your family with its visual appeal and delectable taste.

instructions.display_text: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).

Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a 12-inch (30 cm) cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat. Once the pan is hot, add the onion and cook until softened, about 4 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add the green pepper and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Turn off the heat. Grease the pan with nonstick spray.

Arrange the pepperoni in an even layer on the bottom of the pan. Top with the green peppers, onions, Parmesan, and mozzarella. Arrange the provolone slices over the shredded cheese in an even layer. Top with the pizza sauce and spread evenly.

On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to a 12-inch (30 cm) round. Gently lay the pizza dough over the pizza sauce, making sure the dough reaches to the edges all around. Brush the dough with the remaining tablespoon of olive oil.
Bake for 25 minutes, until the dough is golden brown.
Carefully remove the skillet from the oven. Place a large baking sheet on top, then quickly invert the pizza onto the pan.
Return to the oven and bake for another 20 minutes, until the pepperoni begins to crisp.
Slice into 8 wedges, then serve.
Enjoy!

keywords: deep dish recipe, family dinner, game day, one pan pizza, party dish, tasty, ultimate pizza recipe, upside down deep dish pizza
name: Upside-Down One Pan Pizza

components.extra_comment: seeded and thinly sliced into rings
components.raw_text: 1 green bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced into rings

seo_title: Upside-Down One Pan Pizza Recipe - Tasty

compilations.description: Any time is pizza time: there's no question about that. But maybe you need a break from the Papa or the Hut and, well, so does your wallet. We're bringing the pizza party to your kitchen instead. Start your day with a Quinoa Pizza Burger or enjoy a Pizza Cordon Bleu as a mouthwatering evening snack. It's Italy reinvented: you in?
compilations.name: These Pizzas Are A Total Game Changer

compilations.description: Quinoa is one of those superfoods that we all want to love but don’t know how to cook. Of course, there is the basic power salad. But did you know that you can also make a pizza crust from quinoa? Or these quinoa pizza burgers that are great to make for your vegetarian guests or for meatless Mondays! We personally love to munch on the high-protein baked quinoa bites to keep our energy levels up through the day. And this one-pan southwestern chicken quinoa is insanely good and easy to make. Pick your fav!
compilations.name: The Best Dishes To Cook With Quinoa
What To Do With All That Quinoa

compilations.description: Eating healthy doesn't mean your food has to be bland and tasteless. Get your nutrients from the ultimate superfood, quinoa, with these specially curated recipes, starting with the Quinoa Pizza Burger; yes, you read that right, and boy, does it taste delicious! Or try Quinoa Rice Cakes with Mediterranean Chicken. Let’s go healthy this fall!
compilations.name: Tasty Quinoa Recipes!

description: Say hello to a healthier twist on pizza night with these Quinoa Pizza Burgers! Packed with protein and bursting with flavor, these burgers are a fun and nutritious way to satisfy your pizza cravings.

instructions.display_text: Preheat oven to 400˚F (200˚C).
In a large bowl add the quinoa, beans, tomato, paste, and seasonings. Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together.
Take a quarter of quinoa-bean mixture and shape it into a patty using your hands. Repeat with the remaining mixture to create four patties.
Place the patties on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Top with mozzarella, and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Place the patties on buns, and top with tomato sauce, shredded Parmesan, and fresh basil.
Enjoy!

keywords: , bean, black, burger, cauliflower, chickpea, corn, pizza, potato, sweet, vegetarian, veggie
name: Quinoa Pizza Burgers

components.raw_text: 1 15-ounce can pinto beans, drained and rinsed
